The Chamber of Commerce, Industry and Agriculture of Mauritania (, ), abbreviated as CCIAM, is the national chamber of commerce of Mauritania.
External links
* [https://www.commerce.gov.mr/?q=node/1237 Presentation by the Ministry of Trade, Industry, Handicrafts, and Tourism]
* [https://www.commerce.gov.mr/fr/?q=node/1237 Presentation by the Ministry of Trade, Industry, Handicrafts, and Tourism]
